name: Granny's Grantastic Granventure
description: While babysitting her grandchildren one evening, Beatrice fell asleep and they wandered off. Now she must proceed through a world filled with challenging obstacles, puzzling puzzles, and dank memes to be reunited with her little rascals.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
